1308103.desc: When the Ultimate's Rainblade hits enemy targets that have Crimson Knot, the DMG dealt by Acheron increases by #1[i]%, stacking up to #2[i] time(s) and lasting for #3[i] turn(s). And when Stygian Resurge triggers, additionally deals DMG for #4[i] times. Each time deals Lightning DMG equal to #5[i]% of Acheron's ATK to a single random enemy and is considered as Ultimate DMG.

1309101.name: Coloratura Cadenza
1309101.desc: When the battle begins, action advances this character by #1[i]%.

1309102.name: Impromptu Flourish
1309102.desc: While the Concerto state is active, the CRIT DMG dealt when all allies launch Follow-up ATK increases by #1[i]%.

1309103.name: Sequential Passage
1309103.desc: When using Skill, additionally regenerates #1[i] Energy.

1310101.name: Module α: Antilag Outburst
1310101.desc: During the Complete Combustion, attacking enemies that have no Fire Weakness can also reduce their Toughness, with the effect being equivalent to #1[i]% of the original Toughness Reduction from abilities.

1310102.name: Module β: Autoreactive Armor
1310102.desc: When SAM is in Complete Combustion with a Break Effect that is equal to or greater than #1[i]%/#2[i]%, attacking a Weakness-Broken enemy target will convert the Toughness Reduction of this attack into 1 instance of #3[i]%/#4[i]% Super Break DMG.

1310103.name: Module γ: Core Overload
1310103.desc: For every #2[i] point(s) of SAM's ATK that exceeds #1[i], increases this unit's Break Effect by #3[f1]%.

1312101.name: Release
1312101.desc: Before the Ultimate's first hit, increases the base chance of Freezing the target by #1[i]%.

1312102.name: Interlock
1312102.desc: When using the Ultimate, increases the Effect Hit Rate by #1[i]%, lasting until the end of the current Ultimate's action.

1312103.name: Transmission
1312103.desc: When dealing DMG to Frozen enemies, increases CRIT DMG by #1[i]%.

1313101.name: Rest Day's Longing
1313101.desc: When using Ultimate, if the Energy regenerated for the target is less than #1[i], increases the regenerated Energy to #1[i].

1313102.name: Exalted Sweep
1313102.desc: When battle starts, Sunday regenerates #1[i] Energy.

1313103.name: Haven in Palm
1313103.desc: When using Skill, dispels #1[i] debuff(s) from the target.

1314101.name: Reverse Repo
1314101.desc: When an enemy target enters combat, Jade gains #2[i] stack(s) of Pawned Asset. When the Debt Collector character's turn starts, additionally gains #1[i] stack(s) of Pawned Asset.

1314102.name: Collateral Ticket
1314102.desc: When the battle starts, action advances Jade by #1[i]%.

1314103.name: Asset Forfeiture
1314103.desc: Each Pawned Asset stack from the Talent additionally increases Jade's ATK by #1[f1]%.

1315101.name: Ghost Load
1315101.desc: Increase this character's CRIT Rate/CRIT DMG, by an amount equal to #1[i]%/#3[i]% of Break Effect, up to a max increase of #2[i]%/#4[i]%.

1315102.name: Above Snakes
1315102.desc: While Boothill is in the Standoff, reduces the DMG he receives from targets that are not in the Standoff by #1[i]%.

1315103.name: Point Blank
1315103.desc: When in Standoff and gaining Pocket Trickshot, regenerates #1[i] Energy. Can also trigger this effect when gaining Pocket Trickshot stacks that exceed the max limit.

1317101.name: Ninjutsu Inscription: Sky High
1317101.desc: When the Weakness of an elite-level or higher enemy is broken, Rappa additionally gains #2[i] point(s) of Charge and regenerates #1[i] Energy.

1317102.name: Ninjutsu Inscription: Sea Echo
1317102.desc: While in the "Sealform" state, after Rappa uses Enhanced Basic ATK to deal DMG to a Weakness Broken enemy target, converts the Toughness Reduction from this instance of DMG to 1 instance of #1[i]% Super Break DMG.

1317103.name: Ninjutsu Inscription: Withered Leaf
1317103.desc: When an enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, increases the Break DMG taken by #1[i]%. If Rappa's current ATK is higher than #2[i], for every 100 excess ATK, additionally increases this value by #3[i]%, up to a max additional increase of #4[i]%. This effect lasts for #5[i] turn(s).

1401101.name: Aloofly Honest
1401101.desc: When ally targets attack, inflicts 1 stack of "Interpretation" on the hit enemy target. After attacking, for every 1 target hit by this attack, regenerates #1[i] fixed Energy for The Herta, counting up to a maximum of 5 targets. When using Enhanced Skill, if the primary target's "Interpretation" stack reaches 42, increases the Ice DMG dealt by The Herta by #2[i]%, lasting until the end of this attack.

1401102.name: Message From Beyond the Veil
1401102.desc: When entering battle, if the team has 2 or more Erudition characters, increases all allies' CRIT DMG by #1[i]%. And the Trace "Aloofly Honest" counts at least #2[i] target(s) when calculating the number of targets hit. After attacking, applies #3[i] "Interpretation" stack(s) to the target that has the highest existing "Interpretation" stacks among the hit enemy targets. If the attacker is an Erudition character, then additionally applies #4[i] "Interpretation" stack(s).

1401103.name: Starved Landscape of Vacua
1401103.desc: For every 1 stack of "Interpretation" inflicted on enemy targets, The Herta gains 1 stack of "Answer," up to a max of #2[i] stack(s). When using Ultimate, each "Answer" stack increases this instance of Ultimate's DMG multiplier by #1[f1]%.

1402101.name: The Myopic's Doom
1402101.desc: While in "Supreme Stance," increases Aglaea's and Garmentmaker's ATK by an amount equal to #1[i]% of Aglaea's SPD plus #2[i]% of Garmentmaker's SPD.

1402102.name: Last Thread of Fate
1402102.desc: When Garmentmaker disappears, up to #1[i] stack(s) of the SPD Boost from the Memosprite Talent can be retained. When Garmentmaker is summoned again, gains the corresponding number of SPD Boost stacks.

1402103.name: The Speeding Sol
1402103.desc: At the start of battle, if this unit's Energy is lower than #1[i]%, regenerates this unit's Energy to #2[i]%.

1403101.name: Lamb Outside the Wall...
1403101.desc: After using Talent's Follow-up ATK, increases the DMG dealt by Tribbie by #1[i]%. This effect can stack up to #2[i] time(s), lasting for #3[i] turn(s).

1403102.name: Glass Ball with Wings!
1403102.desc: While the Zone lasts, Tribbie's Max HP increases by an amount equal to #1[i]% of the sum of all ally characters' Max HP.

1403103.name: Pebble at Crossroads?
1403103.desc: At the start of battle, Tribbie regenerates #1[i] Energy. After other ally targets attack, Tribbie regenerates #2[f1] Energy for each target hit.

1404101.name: Earth and Water
1404101.desc: During the "Vendetta" state, Mydei will not exit the "Vendetta" state when receiving a killing blow. This effect can trigger #1[i] time(s) per battle.

1404102.name: Thirty Tyrants
1404102.desc: While in the "Vendetta" state, Mydei is immune to Crowd Control debuffs.

1404103.name: Bloodied Chiton
1404103.desc: When battle starts, if Mydei's Max HP exceeds #1[i], for every 100 excess HP, Mydei's CRIT Rate increases by #3[f1]%, his Charge ratio from enemy targets' DMG increases by #4[f1]%, and his HP restored when receiving healing increases by #5[f2]%. Up to #2[i] excess HP can be taken into account for this effect.

1405101.name: Roaming Signifier
1405101.desc:
When using Basic ATK, additionally regenerates #1[i] Energy.
At the start of the turn, if there are no enemy targets in the "Qualitative Disclosure" state, immediately regenerates #2[i] Energy.

1405102.name: Imperative Hiatus
1405102.desc:
Based on the number of "Erudition" characters in the team, one of the following effects will be triggered in the current battle:
1 character: Increases Anaxa's CRIT DMG by #1[i]%.
At least 2 characters: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by #2[i]%.

1405103.name: Qualitative Shift
1405103.desc: For every 1 different Weakness Type an enemy target has, the DMG that Anaxa deals to that target ignores #1[i]% of their DEF. Up to a max of 7 Weakness Types can be taken into account for this effect.

1406101.name: Empyrean Strides
1406101.desc: When Cipher's SPD is higher than or equal to 140/170, CRIT Rate increases by #1[i]%/#2[i]%, and the gained tally increases by #3[i]%/#4[i]%.

1406102.name: 300 Rogues
1406102.desc: Cipher can tally #1[i]% of the non-True DMG dealt by ally targets to the enemy targets other than the "Patron." Overflow DMG is not tallied.

1406103.name: Sleight of Sky
1406103.desc: Increases the CRIT DMG dealt by the Talent's Follow-up ATK by #2[i]%. When Cipher is on the battlefield, DMG received by all enemy targets increases by #1[i]%.

1407101.name: Contained Dark Tide
1407101.desc: After ally targets (excluding Netherwing) receive healing, converts #1[i]% of the healed amount into "Newbud." If Netherwing is on the field, this is converted to Netherwing's HP instead. Each ally target can accumulate a conversion amount up to #2[i]% of the max "Newbud." After any unit takes action, all units reset their accumulated conversion amount.

1407102.name: Inverted Torch
1407102.desc: When Castorice's current HP is higher than or equal to #1[i]% of her Max HP, her SPD increases by #2[i]%. When Netherwing uses "Breath Scorches the Shadow" and deals fatal damage to all enemies on the field or brings them to a point where their HP cannot be reduced further, Netherwing's SPD increases by #3[i]%, lasting for 1 turn.

1407103.name: Where The West Wind Dwells
1407103.desc: Each time Netherwing uses "Breath Scorches the Shadow," the DMG dealt increases by #1[i]%. This effect stacks up to #2[i] time(s) and lasts until the end of this turn.

1408101.name: March to Oblivion
1408101.desc: When the battle starts, gains #2[i] point(s) of "Coreflame." When the transformation ends, gains #1[i] point(s) of "Coreflame."

1408102.name: Bide in Flames
1408102.desc:
When receiving healing or a Shield from a teammate, deals #1[i]% increased DMG for #2[i] turn(s). This effect cannot trigger repeatedly within one turn.
When receiving an Energy Regeneration effect from a teammate's ability, gains #3[i] point(s) of "Coreflame."

1408103.name: Shine with Valor
1408103.desc: When entering combat or ending transformation, increases ATK by #1[i]%. This effect can stack up to #2[i] time(s).

1409101.name: Gloomy Grin
1409101.desc: Increases Hyacine's and Little Ica's CRIT Rate by #1[i]%. When providing healing to an ally target whose current HP is equal to or less than #2[i]% of their Max HP, increases Hyacine's and Little Ica's Outgoing Healing by #3[i]%.

1409102.name: Stormy Caress
1409102.desc: Increases Hyacine's Effect RES by #1[i]%. When using Skill and Ultimate, dispels #2[i] debuff(s) from all ally targets.

1409103.name: Tempestuous Halt
1409103.desc: When Hyacine's SPD exceeds #1[i], increases her and Little Ica's Max HP by #2[i]%. Then, for every #3[i] excess SPD, increases Hyacine's and Little Ica's Outgoing Healing by #4[i]%. Up to a max of #5[i] excess SPD can be taken into account for this effect.

1410101.name: The Gladius of Conquest
1410101.desc: At the start of combat, Hysilens deploys a Zone, equivalent to that provided by her Ultimate, lasting for #1[i] turn(s). Whenever Hysilens deploys a Zone, she recovers #2[i] Skill Point(s).

1410102.name: The Bubble of Banquets
1410102.desc: When Hysilens uses Ultimate, if the enemy target is currently afflicted with DoT(s), all DoTs currently applied on the target will immediately produce DMG equal to #1[i]% of their original DMG.

1410103.name: The Fiddle of Pearls
1410103.desc: For every #2[i]% of Hysilens's Effect Hit Rate that exceeds #1[i]%, increases her DMG dealt by #3[i]%, up to a max increase of #4[i]%.

1412101.name: Veni
1412101.desc: For every #2[i] of Cerydra's ATK that exceeds #1[i], increases her CRIT DMG by #3[i]%, up to a max increase of #4[i]%.

1412102.name: Vidi
1412102.desc: Increases Cerydra's CRIT Rate by #1[i]%. While Cerydra's Charge is below its maximum, the character with "Military Merit" using their Ultimate grants Cerydra #2[i] Charge. This effect can trigger once per battle.

1412103.name: Vici
1412103.desc: When using Skill, increases SPD by #2[i] for this unit and the teammate with "Military Merit," lasting for #3[i] turn(s). When the character with "Military Merit" uses Basic ATK or Skill, regenerates #1[i] Energy for Cerydra.

1413101.name: Dark the Night, Still the Moon
1413101.desc: Increases Evernight's and the memosprite Evey's CRIT Rate by #1[i]%. When using an ability, consumes #2[i]% of this unit's current HP to increase CRIT DMG for both of them by #3[i]%, lasting for #4[i] turn(s). After Evey uses "Dream, Dissolving, as Dew," recovers 1 Skill Point for allies.

1413102.name: Rouse the Flame, Lull the Light
1413102.desc: When combat starts, Evernight regenerates #2[i] Energy and gains #3[i] "Memoria." When Evernight or an ally memosprite uses an ability, Evernight regenerates #4[i] Energy and gains #1[i] "Memoria."

1413103.name: Kindle the Morn, Drop the Rain
1413103.desc: When there are 1/2/3/(4 or more) Remembrance characters in the team, increases CRIT DMG for all ally memosprites by #1[i]%/#2[i]%/#3[i]%/#4[i]% respectively while Evernight's Skill lasts.

1414101.name: Empyreanity
1414101.desc: When using Skill, increases ATK for the target who has become "Bondmate" by an amount equal to #1[i]% of Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's ATK.

1414102.name: Sylvanity
1414102.desc: When combat starts, Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae advances action by #1[i]%. When the "Bondmate" uses an attack, Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae regenerates #2[i] Energy and "Souldragon" advances action by #3[i]%.

1414103.name: Sublimity
1414103.desc: When "Souldragon" takes action, additionally provides a Shield that can offset DMG equal to #2[i]% of Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's ATK plus #3[i] to the ally target whose current Shield Effect is the lowest. When repeatedly receiving Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's Shield, can stack the Shield Effect, but it will not exceed #4[i]% of the current Shield provided by Skill. When the enhanced "Souldragon" takes action, additionally deals 1 instance of Additional DMG of the Bondmate's Type to the one enemy target whose current HP is the highest, equal to #1[i]% of the Bondmate's ATK.

8001101.name: Ready for Battle
8001101.desc: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates #1[i] Energy.

8001102.name: Tenacity
8001102.desc: Each Talent stack increases the Trailblazer's DEF by #1[i]%.

8001103.name: Fighting Will
8001103.desc: When using Skill or Ultimate "Blowout: RIP Home Run," DMG dealt to the target enemy is increased by #1[i]%.

8002101.name: Ready for Battle
8002101.desc: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates #1[i] Energy.

8002102.name: Tenacity
8002102.desc: Each Talent stack increases the Trailblazer's DEF by #1[i]%.

8002103.name: Fighting Will
8002103.desc: When using Skill or Ultimate "Blowout: RIP Home Run," DMG dealt to the target enemy is increased by #1[i]%.

8003101.name: The Strong Defend the Weak
8003101.desc: After using the Skill, the DMG taken by all allies decreases by #2[i]% for #3[i] turn(s).

8003102.name: Unwavering Gallantry
8003102.desc: Using Enhanced Basic ATK restores the Trailblazer's HP by #1[i]% of their Max HP.

8003103.name: Action Beats Overthinking
8003103.desc: When the Trailblazer is protected by a Shield at the beginning of the turn, increases their ATK by #2[i]% and regenerates #1[i] Energy until the action is over.

8004101.name: The Strong Defend the Weak
8004101.desc: After using the Skill, the DMG taken by all allies decreases by #2[i]% for #3[i] turn(s).

8004102.name: Unwavering Gallantry
8004102.desc: Using Enhanced Basic ATK restores the Trailblazer's HP by #1[i]% of their Max HP.

8004103.name: Action Beats Overthinking
8004103.desc: When the Trailblazer is protected by a Shield at the beginning of the turn, increases their ATK by #2[i]% and regenerates #1[i] Energy until the action is over.

8005101.name: Dance With the One
8005101.desc: When the number of enemy targets on the field is 5 (or more)/4/3/2/1, the Super Break DMG triggered by the Backup Dancer effect increases by #1[i]%/#2[i]%/#3[i]%/#4[i]%/#5[i]%.

8005102.name: Shuffle Along
8005102.desc: When using Skill, additionally increases the Toughness Reduction of the first instance of DMG by #1[i]%.

8005103.name: Hat of the Theater
8005103.desc: After ally targets break weakness, additionally delays the action of the enemy target by #1[i]%.

8006101.name: Dance With the One
8006101.desc: When the number of enemy targets on the field is 5 (or more)/4/3/2/1, the Super Break DMG triggered by the Backup Dancer effect increases by #1[i]%/#2[i]%/#3[i]%/#4[i]%/#5[i]%.

8006102.name: Shuffle Along
8006102.desc: When using Skill, additionally increases the Toughness Reduction of the first instance of DMG by #1[i]%.

8006103.name: Hat of the Theater
8006103.desc: After ally targets break weakness, additionally delays the action of the enemy target by #1[i]%.

8007101.name: Rhapsode's Scepter
8007101.desc: When the battle starts, Trailblazer's action advances by #1[i]%. When Mem is first summoned, grants Mem #2[i]% Charge.

8007102.name: Petite Parable
8007102.desc: When using "Baddies! Trouble!," Mem immediately gains #1[i]% Charge.

8007103.name: Magnets and Long Chains
8007103.desc: When the Max Energy of an ally target that has "Mem's Support" exceeds #1[i], for every #2[i] excess Energy, additionally increases the multiplier of the True DMG dealt via "Mem's Support" by #3[i]%, up to a max increase of #4[i]%.

8008101.name: Rhapsode's Scepter
8008101.desc: When the battle starts, Trailblazer's action advances by #1[i]%. When Mem is first summoned, grants Mem #2[i]% Charge.

8008102.name: Petite Parable
8008102.desc: When using "Baddies! Trouble!," Mem immediately gains #1[i]% Charge.

8008103.name: Magnets and Long Chains
8008103.desc: When the Max Energy of an ally target that has "Mem's Support" exceeds #1[i], for every #2[i] excess Energy, additionally increases the multiplier of the True DMG dealt via "Mem's Support" by #3[i]%, up to a max increase of #4[i]%.

11005101.name: Torture
11005101.desc: When an ally target's Effect Hit Rate is #1[i]% or higher, Kafka increases that target's ATK by #2[i]%.

11005102.name: Plunder
11005102.desc: If an enemy target is defeated while Shocked, Kafka additionally regenerates #1[i] Energy.

11005103.name: Thorns
11005103.desc: After using Ultimate, restores the triggerable count of Talent's Follow-up ATK by 1. And the Talent's Follow-up ATK can cause all DoTs debuffs currently on the target to immediately produce DMG equal to #1[i]% of the original DMG.

11006101.name: Generate
11006101.desc: The duration of "Bug" is extended by #1[i] turn(s). Every time an enemy's Weakness gets broken, Silver Wolf has a #2[i]% base chance of implanting a random "Bug" on that target.

11006102.name: Inject
11006102.desc: When the battle starts, immediately regenerates #1[i] Energy. When Silver Wolf's turn starts, she regenerates #2[i] Energy.

11006103.name: Side Note
11006103.desc: For every #1[i]% Effect Hit Rate that Silver Wolf has, additionally increases her ATK by #2[i]%, up to a max of #3[i]%.

11205101.name: Vita Infinita
11205101.desc: When Blade uses Ultimate, the amount cleared from the tally of HP loss is changed to #1[i]%.

11205102.name: Neverending Deaths
11205102.desc: HP restored from healing increases by #2[i]%. After receiving healing, converts #1[i]% of the healed amount to Ultimate's tally of HP loss.

11205103.name: Cyclone of Destruction
11205103.desc: Increases Follow-up ATK DMG from Talent by #1[i]% and additionally regenerates #2[i] Energy.

11212101.name: Deathrealm
11212101.desc: While in the "Spectral Transmigration" state, increases Effect RES by #1[i]%, and increases the Ultimate DMG dealt by #2[i]%.

11212102.name: Sword Champion
11212102.desc: After using "Transcendent Flash," additionally regenerates #1[i] Energy. And after using "Moon On Glacial River," additionally regenerates #2[i] Energy.

11212103.name: Frost Wraith
11212103.desc: Upon obtaining "Syzygy," if its stack limit has been reached, Jingliu's next attack ignores #1[i]% of the target's DEF.
